SuzuranKhas:ForgottenTorii.NAME: Forgotten Torii
DESCRIPTIONS: You discover an ancient, forgotten torii gate. No one has set foot here for a very long time. At the end of the torii stands a small altar, seemingly waiting for something...
You search around the torii and #gdiscover some Ofuda.
You decide to activate the altar. After a moment of dizziness, #gyou find yourself holding a large number of Ofuda, #rbut you feel unusually weak...
You choose not to disturb this ancient torii and quietly leave this place.
OPTIONS: [Activate Altar]: #gGain 5 Ofuda. #rReduce your HP to 15 if it's higher.
